message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $125.  I'm confident this product is worth the investment. What do you say?
I see your point, Alice. Considering the product's value, I can agree to $123 for it.
